name: Northern Vietnam Motorbike Tour to Mai Chau, Sapa, Hagiang, Ba Be
description: This memorable Northern Vietnam Motorbike Tour to Mai Chau, Sapa, Hagiang, Ba Be  is designed for those who want to discover almost natural beauties of high mountains, deep valleys, friendly ethnic minorities, typical cultures, traditions in the whole Northern Vietnam from North-West to North-East including Mai Chau, Phu Yen, Son La, Than Uyen, Sapa, Bac Ha, Hoang Su Phi, Ha Giang, Dong Van, Ba Be lake on the offroad tracks.
